mods.note: SOCIETE des nations Rapport de la Commission chargee par le Conseil de I’etude de la frontiere entre I’lrak et la Syrie juillet 1932 ANNEXE N°3a LEAGUE OF NATIONS Report of the Commission set up by the Council to examine the frontier between Iraq and Syria JULY 1932 ANNEX No. 3a

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: On three sheets 758 x 591mm or smaller

mods.abstract: The map shows the area around the frontier between Iraq and Syria, it includes a green line showing the frontier suggested by the Commission of Enquiry set up by the Council of the League of Nations to examine the frontier between Iraq and Syria. The map includes a key (in French) indicating various features. The map also includes contours and form lines, and hydrology is indicated. The map was published by the Topographical Bureau of the Forces in the Levant. Most of the text on the map is in French.
